User instruction: 创建新文档并添加标题"研发项目计划"，设置背景颜色为浅绿色。
Feasible API sequence: create_and_save_docx(doc_path, "");add_heading(doc_path, "研发项目计划", level=1);set_background_color("light green");

User instruction: 添加二级标题"项目概述"、"技术路线"和"进度安排"。
Feasible API sequence: add_heading(doc_path, "项目概述", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "技术路线", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "进度安排", level=2);

User instruction: 在"进度安排"下插入一个甘特图。
Feasible API sequence: create_bar_chart(["需求分析", "概要设计", "详细设计", "编码实现", "测试验证"], [2, 3, 4, 8, 3], title="项目进度甘特图", xlabel="阶段", ylabel="周数");
